page.title: 07VILLAGES-SHERIFFHALES AREA
page.content: In the village of{Sheriffhales}there is little transport and there are no bus services.The place around the villages are very tidy and there is no litter. Some villages have big country houses and others have bungalows.I like villages they are peaceful and usually there is no vandalism.Most people like villages because they are not like city or towns they are quite the opposite. The gardens are very tidy and some of the houses and gardens are shaded by trees. The village i am looking at is {Sherrifhales}and there is only one village shop which is a post office too.
